data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

Take 9 steps left and you are on the other side of the circle. Take 10 steps forward and you are on the opposite side of the circle. Take 9 steps right and you are on the opposite side of the circle. Take 3 steps forward and you are on the opposite side of the circle. The instructions are written to always face forward. Therefore, the answer is No.
